alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 04 at 4:56AM CST until January 04 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts to 60 MPH possible. * WHERE...High plains of southeast Wyoming and the western Nebraska Panhandle including Lusk, Torrington, Scottsbluff, Harrisburg, Kimball, Sidney, and Bridgeport. * WHEN...9 AM MST until 5 PM MST today. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff
